headline: Could Buying Occidental Petroleum Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: One of Occidental Petroleum's biggest claims to fame is that Berkshire Hathaway is a major shareholder.  Warren Buffett's backing goes back to one of the reasons investors might want to buy Oxy.  There are some reasons investors might prefer other energy stocks.

headline: Occidental Petroleum: Why Warren Buffett Kept Buying
summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway boosts Occidental Petroleum stake, showcasing confidence in its long-term value.
